content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: skull_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 54, "index": 17}, {"type": "chorus_flower", "quantity": 25, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 49, "index": 19}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a skull_banner_pattern, I need to place a paper and a wither_skeleton_skull side by side in the crafting table. The paper is at slot 22 and the wither_skeleton_skull is at slot 29. I will first move the paper to slot 1.
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: skull_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 54, "index": 17}, {"type": "chorus_flower", "quantity": 25, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 49, "index": 19}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: Since the paper is already in the crafting table, I will now move the wither_skeleton_skull to slot 2, which is to the right of slot 1.
act: move from slot 29 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: skull_banner_pattern
inventory=[{"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "paper", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_skull", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "orange_carpet", "quantity": 20, "index": 14}, {"type": "beetroot", "quantity": 54, "index": 17}, {"type": "chorus_flower", "quantity": 25, "index": 18}, {"type": "warped_fungus", "quantity": 49, "index": 19}, {"type": "dolphin_spawn_egg", "quantity": 3, "index": 30}, {"type": "light_gray_dye", "quantity": 32, "index": 32}, {"type": "sandstone", "quantity": 17, "index": 38}, {"type": "pink_concrete_powder", "quantity": 18, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I can craft the skull_banner_pattern by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
